content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
- only one server for the entire restaurant- and the restaurant was crowded-the wait times to even put in our order was 35 minutes. Every customer was complaining-I'm vegetarian and I ordered the one vegetarian thing on the menu- the Kimchi Jjigae - it came out with pork!!.I used to come here all the time, and the quality has plummeted like i've never experienced before
